title: Ringmaster
name: Maul
description: The Ringmaster is the charismatic and ruthless leader of the infamous traveling fighting arena: The Butcher's Circus. She delights in orchestrating spectacles of combat, pushing contestants to their limits for the entertainment of bloodthirsty crowds. Her elaborate costume and masked helm conceal a shrewd mind that's always calculating the next big show.
history: Rising from humble beginnings, the Ringmaster built her reputation through cunning and a flair for the dramatic. She transformed a small-time fighting pit into a renowned traveling arena, drawing both desperate warriors and thrill-seeking audiences from across the land.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Ornate spiked helm with a single eye hole
clothing.accessories: Large bow tie, sleeves in mismatched colours

notes: Her mouth is often covered in blood, which everyone hopes is just part of her makeup
Often accompanied by the Circus Twins, Jack and Jacques, who serve as her guardians and performers, even on quests
